analysis.key_quote: The creation of at-will positions through the reclassification of federal workers would undermine their ability to perform that work without fearing retribution if their work is not liked by a party in power.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting the importance of protections for federal employees and expressing concerns about politicization and retribution, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
